channel.title: Diablo : The movie
channel.description:
Classic computer game (anything more than ten years old qualifies as a classic in video games, right?) will be adapted for the screen according to the Legendary Pictures website. The site also advertises the coming of the Superman Returns sequel, World of Warcraft, and Clash of the Titans. The original Diablo was a fantasy adventure game in which a lone hero battles the forces of evil in the town of Tristram in the fictional kingdom of Khanduras. No information seems to exist about the film production yet, and who are we to speculate? We'll just keep you informed as things develop.
<3. Though if Blizzard doesn't announce Diablo 3 in Blizzcon 2007 I'm going to have to commit suicide :(

item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Bang Train:

ya…but blizz isnt one to finish games on time, if ever…dont count on 3 games coming out, count on 2

True they end up taking forever and fall behind on the graphics compared to things out around the time they release it…

But they make it up in Game Play and Story Line :D!

item.title: Diablo : The movie
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Bang Train, post:4, topic:117071”]Proboly wont be diablo 3 yet.

At blizzcon you can play starcraft 2. After SC2 they will proboly start D3[/quote]

I think they have been already working on it…

Paul Sams told IGN that Blizzard was currently working on at least three other unannounced titles at the moment and, just to rub it in, dropped StarCraft’s name.

So … Umm yea…

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo : The movie
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Well the movie does have potential… A WoW movie doesn’t…

Diablo 1 & 2 are based on books… There are 5 books , people are saying Diablo 3 is going to be either a prequel to Diablo 1 or continuing Diablo 2

Where its going to be a fight between heaven and hell… But anyway…
